item.title: My New Blog Home with Azure Static Web App
item.description: So, I have spent the last few days / weeks deciding the best way to host a blog. Now I have a decidedly “split personality”. By this I mean I like to segregate my work and personal hobbies. This can be quite beneficial as this allows me to test a few things. A few key decisions Must be version controlled - good practice and forces me to get more familiar with git.
